item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 7, 02:00 - 03:00 UTC

Nov 28, 15:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/12/2023 02:00 UTC
End time : 07/12/2023 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster024
item.description:
Nov 24, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
End time : 16/11/2023 08:32 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue on room G263 in GRA2

On 16/11/2023 at 01:55 UTC, room G263 of the Graveline datacenter (GRA2) experienced an electrical incident that may have impacted your services. The intervention of our technical teams enabled you to return your services in the morning (16/11 at 08:32 UTC).
We then secured the infrastructure by making the system redundant.
The services are once again in nominal operation.

Nov 16, 10:22 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : We have some hosts unreachable
Root cause : due to this incident: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/sdv7r15bh9lf
Ongoing actions :

Nov 16, 05:53 UTC
Update - After a fix implemented by our technical teams, the situation is gradually returning to normal.

Nov 16, 04:12 UTC
Identified - Start time : 16/11/2023 01:55 UTC
Service impact : We have some hosts unreachable due to this incident: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/sdv7r15bh9lf
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix, and an update will be posted as soon as significant progress has been made.

item.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Service degradation
item.description:
Nov 16, 07:46 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 15/11/2023 06:30 UTC
End time : 15/11/2023 16:34 UTC
Root cause : Fiber continuity issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 15, 16:27 UTC
Update - Our provider's technicians are still on site and are continuing the intervention, which is taking longer than expected.

Nov 15, 14:08 UTC
Update - Update : Our provider has located the fault.
Technicians are deployed to repair and re-establish access

Nov 15, 12:06 UTC
Update - Our provider carries out the intervention on site in order to locate the fault and restore services.

Nov 15, 11:08 UTC
Update - We have a generic incident which impacts a large number of services throughout France.
This is linked to the loss of a backbone link from our provider in ÃŽle-de-France which creates saturation on our network and causes a degradation of your services.
The provider's teams are on site to locate the fault.

Nov 15, 09:21 UTC
Update - Update : The incident is currently being dealt with by the provider's teams. An update will be published when significant progress has been made.

Nov 15, 09:16 UTC
Identified - Start time : 15/11/2023 06:30UTC
Service impact : A degradation was detected on the provider equipment, leading to a deterioration of the connection to the services. Some latency, disruption with the connection, and service degradation will be observed
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
